long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GovPipeline AI Extension is a Chrome extension designed to streamline the process of transferring data from SAM.gov to your CRM at GovPipeline AI. With seamless user authentication, the extension efficiently captures relevant contract and grant information directly from SAM.gov. Once authenticated, it processes this data and imports it into your CRM pipeline, ensuring accurate and timely updates. This tool is ideal for businesses and individuals seeking to enhance their CRM management with minimal effort. Enjoy a more productive and organized workflow with the GovPipeline AI Extension.
